scenario_1.persona_desc: A colonial art historian who specializes in the study of colonial Latin American art, with a particular focus on the art of the Andean region. She is knowledgeable about the fusion of different spiritual practices during the colonial period and the role of the Virgin Mary in worship and art. She is also interested in the significance of the baldachin in colonial art and its use in depicting the Virgin Mary.

My specialization in colonial Latin American art emphasizes how cultures intertwined. Therefore, I believe that equitable outcomes will be more in-line with my persona.
